data.title: Hotel Near University of the East Ramon Magsaysay Memorial Medical Center, University of the East Ramon Magsaysay Memorial Medical Center, Aurora Boulevard, Quezon City, Metro Manila, Philippines
meta_keywords: Hotel Near University of the East Ramon Magsaysay Memorial Medical Center
University of the East Ramon Magsaysay Memorial Medical Center
data.meta_description: Hotel Near University of the East Ramon Magsaysay Memorial Medical Center, University of the East Ramon Magsaysay Memorial Medical Center, Aurora Boulevard, Quezon City, Metro Manila, Philippines
data.text:
1. Mezza 2 Condotel

Address: Unit 2528 Mezza 2 Aurora Boulevard Corner Guirayan

Located 3.9 km from Smart Araneta Coliseum in Manila, this air-conditioned apartment features a balcony with city views. This apartment provides a year-round outdoor pool and free WiFi.

2. Mezza 2 Condominium

Address: Unit 2523, Mezza 2 Residences, Aurora Blvd Corner

Mezza 2 Condominium is an apartment located in Manila, 3.9 km from Smart Araneta Coliseum. The apartment is 5 km from SM Megamall. A flat-screen TV is available. Other facilities at Mezza 2 Condominium include a sun terrace.

3. 1 Bed Apartment Mezza 2

Address: Unit 4034 Tower 1, Mezza Residences, Aurora Boulev

Situated 3.9 km from Smart Araneta Coliseum in Manila, this air-conditioned apartment features free WiFi. The apartment is 5 km from SM Megamall. A microwave and a fridge can be found in the kitchen.

4. Mezza II Condo Residences

Address: Mezza 2 G.araneta Avenue Aurora Boulevard Corner G

Mezza II Condo Residences is an apartment situated in Manila, 3.9 km from Smart Araneta Coliseum. The air-conditioned unit is 5 km from SM Megamall.

5. Nice 1 BD in Mezza II Residences

Address: Mezza II Residences, Guirayan, Quezon City

Located 3.9 km from Smart Araneta Coliseum in Manila, this air-conditioned apartment features free WiFi and a balcony. The unit is 5 km from SM Megamall. Private parking is available on site. There is a seating area, a dining area and a kitchen.

6. ZEN Rooms Quezon V.Mapa

Address: Located in Robbinsdale Hotel, #14 Araneta Avenue c

ZEN Rooms Quezon V.Mapa is located in Manila, 4.1 km from Smart Araneta Coliseum. Guests can enjoy the on-site restaurant. Free WiFi is featured and free private parking is available on site.

7. Sorrel Residences - Marlyn

Address: Unit 1106 B, Sociego Street, Sampaloc

Situated 4.4 km from Century City in Manila, this apartment features a terrace with garden views. The air-conditioned unit is 5 km from Smart Araneta Coliseum. Free WiFi is featured and private parking is available on site.

8. Robbinsdale Residences

Address: # 14 Araneta Ave. corner Palanza St.

Robbinsdale Residences features elegant rooms with free Wi-Fi, located a 5-minute walk from SM Sta Mesa Mall. Offering free parking, it has a restaurant and 24-hour reception.

9. Madison 101 Hotel & Tower

Address: Aurora Blvd., corner Madison St., New Manila, Quez

Set 2.5 km from Smart Araneta Coliseum in Manila, Madison 101 Hotel & Tower features free WiFi access and free private parking. Guests can enjoy the on-site restaurant. Each room at this hotel is air conditioned and is fitted with a flat-screen TV.

10. ZEN Rooms Quezon San Juan

Address: Located in Madison 101 Hotel, Corner, Aurora Blvd,

ZEN Rooms Quezon San Juan offers accommodation in Manila. Guests can enjoy the on-site restaurant. Free WiFi is offered and free private parking is available on site. Each room has a flat-screen TV. You will find a kettle in the room.
